Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-22872 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 0.59.0-28
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-22872 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 0.59.0-28. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubevirt is earlier than 0.59.0-28, affected by CVE-2025-22872
